backend/main.mo: Defines actor with access control and storage mixins plus many user, subscription, post, listing, payment, and quota types and maps that form the backend state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to related files, components, tests, and metadata for planning and tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their roles in UI layout, features, hooks, and sections.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: Configures asset caching, content types, and security headers for the frontend deployment on the IC.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining CSS variables, theming, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app root and Google Analytics tag.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component managing global state, contexts, routing between sections, creation modes, authentication, and premium features.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthEntryDi: Auth modal offering sign-in/sign-up flows with Google login and success confirmation.
frontend/src/components/auth/ContinueWit: Reusable Google-branded button that triggers Internet Identity login with loading states.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Provides sign-in/out controls using Internet Identity with Google branding and shows principal info.
frontend/src/components/decor/SparkleOve: Decorative sparkle overlay with subtle animation and reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/components/DeployDiagnostic: Displays development-only diagnostics about canister config or actor initialization issues.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Float: Shows a floating button to scroll back to top after scrolling past 30% of the page.
Floating quick-action button that scrolls to the Wish Generator section.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Scrol: Top-fixed progress bar indicating scroll position with a brand gradient.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Stick: Sticky navigation bar with section-aware highlighting and a mobile slide-out menu.
frontend/src/components/PlanStatus.tsx: Renders a badge indicating the user's plan type (free, pro, or creator).
frontend/src/components/Reveal.tsx: Animates children into view with optional delay, respecting reduced-motion preferences.
frontend/src/features/account/useAccount: React Query hooks fetching user download history, saved templates, and creator earnings via actor calls.
frontend/src/features/admin/AccessDenied: Displays an access-denied message for users lacking admin privileges.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPayment: Admin UI component that displays, filters, and updates payment requests with approve/reject actions and status badges.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useAll: React Query hook that fetches all payment requests from the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useIsA: Hook that checks if the authenticated user is an admin using the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useUpd: Mutation hook to approve or reject payment requests and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/features/auth/useUserAuthUp: Mutation hook that creates or updates a user auth record after Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/canvasE: Canvas utility functions that draw visual effects like vignette, glow text, sparkles, confetti, and shadows.
Generates a full card image on canvas with themes, text fitting, background loading, vignette, and export options.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/cardTex: Utility functions to sanitize card text, remove placeholders, and format title/message/footer content.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/cardThe: Defines premium card theme configurations and provides helpers to retrieve theme settings.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/compone: Renders an image carousel with swipe, arrow, and keyboard navigation to select card variation images.
Displays a short confetti animation on a canvas when triggered, respecting reduced-motion settings.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/enhance: Applies subtle contrast, vignette, and sharpening effects to a canvas after rendering.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/fitText: Provides utilities to fit text inside canvas bounds by adjusting font size and line height.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/generat: Returns predefined non-text visual variation parameters for card rendering.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/loadCar: Loads a background image with cross-origin support and returns it as a promise.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/pdfExpo: Generates a printable HTML-based PDF view of a birthday pack and triggers the browser print dialog.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/shortWi: Converts arbitrary text into a 15–20 word card-safe wish with cleanup, shortening, or expansion.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/textWra: Implements word- and emoji-aware text wrapping for canvas rendering within a max width.
frontend/src/features/community/componen: Displays a community post card with metadata, creator info, and follow/view actions using authentication and follow state hooks.
Shows a dialog with full community post details, metadata, and follow functionality for authenticated users.
Provides a dialog for authenticated users to create new community posts with title, type, and description fields.
frontend/src/features/community/hooks/us: Defines React Query hooks for fetching all community posts or a single post via the backend actor.
Implements a mutation hook to create community posts and handle success, errors, and cache invalidation.
Manages follow state for creators using local storage, and provides hooks for following creators and checking follow status.
frontend/src/features/examples/component: Renders a stylized example wish card with themed visuals, emoji effects, and variation switching.
frontend/src/features/examples/exampleWi: Defines emoji sets and utilities for enhancing example wish titles, bodies, and decoration based on relationship, tone, and variation.
Formats a SampleWish into a short birthday title and a compact 1–2 sentence body with length limits.
Maps wishes to visual style tags based on explicit styleTag or inferred tone.
Provides typography and background theme generators using seeded randomness to create consistent card themes.
frontend/src/features/examples/sampleWis: Defines SampleWish type and provides preset example wishes with metadata.
frontend/src/features/generator/constant: Exports allowed relationships, tones, languages, and personalities for the generator.
frontend/src/features/generator/format.t: Formats a BirthdayPack into a shareable multi-section text block.
frontend/src/features/generator/generate: Builds a BirthdayPack by generating wish variants, captions, speeches, and hashtags based on form data and language phrases.
frontend/src/features/generator/language: Provides language-specific phrase sets and selects the appropriate pack based on the chosen language.
frontend/src/features/generator/randomiz: Generates randomized form data using predefined lists and optional name input.
frontend/src/features/generator/types.ts: Defines types for generator inputs, wishes, and template identifiers.
frontend/src/features/marketplace/compon: UI dialog for creating marketplace listings with authentication, entitlement checks, and submission handling.
Displays a marketplace listing card with title, description, price, creator, and a button that opens a request‑to‑buy dialog.
Modal allowing buyers to copy or send a prefilled message to the seller and record interest via a mutation.
frontend/src/features/marketplace/hooks/: React Query mutation for creating new marketplace listings and invalidating the listings query on success.
Mutation that records user interest in a listing and refreshes marketplace data while showing toast notifications.
Fetches the interaction count for a listing when the user is authenticated and an actor is available.
Provides queries to fetch all marketplace listings or a single listing by ID from the actor.
frontend/src/features/payments/hooks/use: Mutation that submits a manual payment request along with optional screenshot and refreshes related payment queries.
Fetches the authenticated user's payment requests using an actor and disables retries.
frontend/src/features/payments/manualUpi: Defines UPI payment constants including UPI ID, payee name, and QR image path.
UI component guiding users through manual UPI payment steps, showing QR code, plan summary, and copy/UPI actions.
Utility for storing and retrieving the user's payment email from localStorage.
Form for submitting a payment request with email, UTR, and optional screenshot upload using the manual UPI flow.
Generates a UPI deep link with encoded plan and payment details.
Disables Razorpay and returns a stub upgrade handler since manual UPI payments are now used.
frontend/src/features/premiumCardDesigne: Displays a grid of placeholder premium card features marked as coming soon with icons and descriptions.
Provides UI controls for adjusting card appearance including background, typography, colors, alignment, and photo upload.
Handles exporting and sharing cards via download, WhatsApp, Instagram, and copying text.
Main module managing theme selection and the full designer workflow with preview, customization, and export.
Renders the live card preview using theme settings, animations, styles, emojis, and optional photo.
Defines all premium themes and provides a helper to fetch a theme by ID.
Declares types for themes, designer state, and customization options.
Hook managing all designer state values and setters for theme and customization options.
frontend/src/features/promptStudio/compo: Renders buttons for upcoming premium video and voice features with a toast notification.
Displays prompt analysis results using badges for event type, tone, theme, and layout.
Provides editable fields for card text, tone selection, and regeneration controls.
Text input with example prompts and a generate button for creating card content.
frontend/src/features/promptStudio/event: Maps event types to recommended card themes and exposes a lookup helper.
frontend/src/features/promptStudio/promp: Rule-based analyzer that infers event type, tone, visual theme, layout, and keywords from a prompt.
Generates card titles, messages, and footers based on analyzed event and tone.
frontend/src/features/promptStudio/types: Defines types for prompt analysis, card content, and example prompts.
frontend/src/features/quota/quotaStorage: Manages daily quota tracking in localStorage with helpers for reading and incrementing.
frontend/src/features/quota/useMessageQu: Hook combining backend and local quota sources to determine remaining generation quota.
frontend/src/features/subscription/plans: Defines plan metadata and entitlements for Free, Pro, and Creator tiers and exposes helpers to retrieve them.
frontend/src/features/subscription/Premi: UI overlay that blocks premium features and opens the pricing modal when unlocked.
frontend/src/features/subscription/Prici: Modal component managing plan comparison, payment steps, and manual UPI verification flow using subscription and payment request data.
Renders a comparison table showing feature availability across Free, Pro, and Creator plans.
frontend/src/features/subscription/UPGRA: Markdown checklist detailing all UI, modal, and payment-flow test cases for upgrade functionality.
frontend/src/features/subscription/useEn: React hook that fetches subscription status and returns the user’s effective plan and its entitlements.
frontend/src/features/subscription/useSu: React hook that retrieves and refreshes the user's subscription status via React Query.
frontend/src/features/surprise/SurpriseV: Component displaying a surprise message with confetti, delayed reveals, and optional background music.
frontend/src/features/surprise/useSurpri: Hooks for creating surprise links and fetching their payloads with error handling and React Query.
frontend/src/features/templates/applyTem: Returns Tailwind class sets for predefined template styles based on a template ID.
frontend/src/features/templates/backgrou: Registry of static background images for templates with a helper to resolve image paths.
frontend/src/features/templates/template: Defines a Template interface and exports a list of predefined template configurations with styling and asset paths.
frontend/src/hooks/useActiveSection.ts: Implements a scroll-spy hook using IntersectionObserver to track which page section is currently active.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Provides a hook to detect when an element enters or leaves the viewport using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlanSelection.ts: Manages a user's selected plan, persisting it in localStorage keyed by principal.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects whether the user prefers reduced motion using a media query listener.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollProgress.ts: Tracks the document's scroll progress from 0 to 1 using requestAnimationFrame updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useWhoAmI.ts: Queries the backend to verify the authenticated principal and returns it or null.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, dark theme variables, layout utilities, and UI helper classes.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Provides a clipboard copy function with a fallback for older browsers.
frontend/src/lib/datetime.ts: Contains utilities for formatting timestamps into relative or formatted dates.
frontend/src/lib/principal.ts: Shortens principal strings by showing prefix and suffix with ellipsis.
frontend/src/lib/scroll.ts: Smoothly scrolls to anchors with sticky header offset and reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Generates a WhatsApp share link from a text string.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/sections/CommunitySection.t: Displays community posts with tabs for all or followed creators, and includes dialogs for creating and viewing post details.
frontend/src/sections/DashboardSection.t: Shows subscription status, message quota, downloads, and admin panels within a dashboard layout.
frontend/src/sections/ExamplesSection.ts: Renders sample wishes with tone filtering and allows users to prefill the generator form using an example.
frontend/src/sections/FaqSection.tsx: Displays a styled FAQ accordion with common questions about the service.
frontend/src/sections/FooterSection.tsx: Provides footer with branding, navigation links, legal links, and a referral badge.
frontend/src/sections/GeneratorSection.t: Implements the wish generator form, handling input changes, randomization, and generating outputs or prompt‑studio content.
frontend/src/sections/HeroSection.tsx: Landing hero section with branding, auth controls, feature badges, and buttons for demo, examples, and generation.
frontend/src/sections/LegalSections.tsx: Renders privacy policy, terms, and refund policy cards with structured legal text.
frontend/src/sections/MarketplaceSection: Marketplace UI with search, filters, listing cards, and dialog to create new listings.
frontend/src/sections/OutputSection.tsx: Generates, previews, and exports AI birthday card outputs with theme selection and prompt studio integration.
frontend/src/sections/PricingSection.tsx: Displays pricing plans with features, highlighting the Pro tier and enabling upgrades.
frontend/src/sections/TemplatesSection.t: React component that displays selectable card templates and shows a live preview using applied template classes.
frontend/src/types/razorpay.d.ts: TypeScript declarations defining Razorpay options, response types, and global window integration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, shadows, and plugin setup.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration enabling React, environment variable injection, path aliases, build settings, and dev server proxying.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing WishMint’s evolution, architecture notes, features, and versioned state.
